name: ViewableBuffer
description: Flexible wrapper around `ArrayBuffer` that also provides typed array views on demand.

methods.name: view
methods.description: View on the raw binary data as a `Int8Array`. */ get int8View(): Int8Array { if (!this._int8View) { this._int8View = new Int8Array(this.rawBinaryData); } return this._int8View; } /** View on the raw binary data as a `Uint8Array`. */ get uint8View(): Uint8Array { if (!this._uint8View) { this._uint8View = new Uint8Array(this.rawBinaryData); } return this._uint8View; } /**  View on the raw binary data as a `Int16Array`. */ get int16View(): Int16Array { if (!this._int16View) { this._int16View = new Int16Array(this.rawBinaryData); } return this._int16View; } /** View on the raw binary data as a `Int32Array`. */ get int32View(): Int32Array { if (!this._int32View) { this._int32View = new Int32Array(this.rawBinaryData); } return this._int32View; } /** View on the raw binary data as a `Float64Array`. */ get float64View(): Float64Array { if (!this._float64Array) { this._float64Array = new Float64Array(this.rawBinaryData); } return this._float64Array; } /** View on the raw binary data as a `BigUint64Array`. */ get bigUint64View(): BigUint64Array { if (!this._bigUint64Array) { this._bigUint64Array = new BigUint64Array(this.rawBinaryData); } return this._bigUint64Array; } /** Returns the view of the given type. `uint16`, `int32`, `uint32`, and `float32`.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Destroys all buffer references. Do not use after calling this.

methods.name: sizeOf
methods.description: Returns the size of the given type in bytes. `uint16`, `int32`, `uint32`, and `float32`.

properties.name: int8View
properties.description: View on the raw binary data as a `Int8Array`.

properties.name: uint8View
properties.description: View on the raw binary data as a `Uint8Array`.

properties.name: int16View
properties.description: View on the raw binary data as a `Int16Array`.

properties.name: int32View
properties.description: View on the raw binary data as a `Int32Array`.

properties.name: float64View
properties.description: View on the raw binary data as a `Float64Array`.

properties.name: bigUint64View
properties.description: View on the raw binary data as a `BigUint64Array`.
